name: Skellamy
description:
"Skellamy" my #Mizjam1 Submission

Press Left mouse Button to set you attack Marker.
Hold Left mouse Button to Resize attack Marker.
Every Human inside will be Targeted :D

Hold Middle Mouse Button or [ WASD] to Move Camera.
Scroll MouseWheel for Zoom.

Defend yourself Against the Humans!

Have fun :D
